column1: Little Goat Diner////Well worth the wait! My friend and I couldn't have been happier with our selections. I had the parathas burrito and my friend had the bull's eye French toast
column2: both were absolutely incredible! The parathas burrito was unlike anything I'd ever had and was the perfect combination of breakfast and lunch food
column3: as well as southern and Indian cuisine. My friend loved her French toast and claims that it made her understand the hype behind chicken and waffles.
